citation.article-title: Revival of the genus Lentzea and proposal for Lechevalieria gen. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of Lentzea nom. rev., emend.

The formal description of Yassin et al. (1995) is emended to reflect the following changes in the chemotaxonomic characteristics. The diagnostic whole-cell sugars include galactose and mannose and might also include ribose. The major menaquinone is MK-9(H4). Tuberculostearic acid is found only in trace quantities, if at all, in fatty acid profiles. The sequence of the 16S rRNA gene contains a genusspecific diagnostic nucleotide signature pattern, namely TCCA (617-620) and GCC (843-845).
